title: Smart Watch CALL client
summary: Smart Watch CALL Client compatible with circle and box shaped watches
description: This client offers you the ability to use your smart watch more effectively in conditions when your cell phone is not near to hand, or you cannot use it. The app is designed to be used in situations such as driving a car with hands-free, in meetings, lectures, school, etc.The application is optimalized for watches with circle and box shaped display, that can be installed on every watch with android wear system.Among its main advantages belongs simple graphic that uses the OLED display technology. The application works mainly with black color, what saves the battery life during long-lasting listing through the calls.FEATURES:    - Data update each time you launch the app    - Quick and easy operation     - Arranged displaying of incoming, outgoing and missed calls    -Calling directly from your watches in cooperation with hands-free set (in car, running,…)    -Sending sample messages from your watches and easy modification by cell phone
descriptionHTML:
This client offers you the ability to use your smart watch more effectively in conditions when your cell phone is not near to hand, or you cannot use it. The app is designed to be used in situations such as driving a car with hands-free, in meetings, lectures, school, etc.

The application is optimalized for watches with circle and box shaped display, that can be installed on every watch with android wear system.

Among its main advantages belongs simple graphic that uses the OLED display technology. The application works mainly with black color, what saves the battery life during long-lasting listing through the calls.

FEATURES:
- Data update each time you launch the app
- Quick and easy operation
- Arranged displaying of incoming, outgoing and missed calls
-Calling directly from your watches in cooperation with hands-free set (in car, running,…)
-Sending sample messages from your watches and easy modification by cell phone
comments: A word of grace I searched for an app to send canned response inmy own language when rejecting a call from my phone. This app is the only one who does it, though after rejecting the call and from its inteface.
Not working The app does not do anything... I run lollipop 5.0.1 on my note 4, connected to a moto 360. May I please have a refund?
